title: Despair of Athkatla
content:
Despair of Athkatla Rare 3~10 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+2 Bludgeoning Arcane Enchantment: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC and spell attack rolls. Weapon Enchantment +2 Main Hand OnlyTopple Touching the adornments, it's clear that Lorroakan's short temper hasflowed into his staff. It flows into your brain in shades of burgundy and carmine, bright as the storm-lanterns of Lorroakan's homeland. Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 190

Despair of Athkatla

Versatile - Wieldin
